HomePage.title: ae-framework
HomePage.subtitle: AI-Enhanced Development Framework with Phase 6 UI/UX Automation

chat.unverified_encryption_warning: This conversation is encrypted but not verified. Verify safety numbers for additional security.
chat.unverified_encryption_banner: This conversation is encrypted but not verified.
chat.message_send_failed: Failed to send message. Please try again.
chat.safety_number_verified: Safety number has been verified successfully.
chat.safety_number_verification_failed: Failed to verify safety number. Please try again.
chat.rate_limit_warning: You're sending messages quickly. Please slow down to avoid being rate limited.

verification.verify_contact_identity: Verify contact identity and secure communication
verification.verify_contact_identity_description: Compare these numbers with your contact to ensure secure communication.
verification.verify_in_person_recommended: It's recommended to verify these numbers in person or over a trusted channel.
verification.compare_numbers_carefully: Compare both numbers carefully - they must match exactly.
verification.contact_if_mismatch: If the numbers don't match, contact your communication provider immediately.
verification.verification_help_text: Need help understanding safety number verification?
verification.safety_number_description: Compare these numbers with {contact} to verify secure communication.
verification.verification_warning: Only mark as verified if you've confirmed these numbers match through a trusted channel.
verification.regenerate_warning: This will create new safety numbers and reset verification status. Both you and your contact will need to re-verify.

devices.manage_trusted_devices: Manage your trusted devices and security settings
devices.device_management_description: Manage all devices that have access to your secure conversations.
devices.no_devices_found: No devices found with the current filter.
devices.revoke_device_warning: This will permanently remove access for '{deviceName}'. The device will need to be re-verified to regain access.
devices.unverified_devices_security_warning: You have {count} unverified devices. Review and verify or revoke them to maintain security.
devices.verify_new_devices_immediately: Verify new devices immediately after they appear
devices.revoke_unused_devices_regularly: Regularly revoke access for devices you no longer use
devices.monitor_device_activity: Monitor device activity and report suspicious access
devices.report_suspicious_devices: Report any suspicious or unknown devices immediately

settings.manage_security_preferences: Manage your security preferences and encryption settings
settings.security_settings_description: Configure your security and privacy preferences for secure messaging.
settings.auto_key_rotation_description: Automatically rotate encryption keys on a regular schedule for enhanced security.
settings.require_device_verification_description: Require verification for all new devices before allowing access to conversations.
settings.allow_screenshots_description: Allow screenshots and screen recording within the application (not recommended for sensitive conversations).
settings.encrypted_backups_description: Automatically create encrypted backups of your conversations and security settings.
settings.rotate_keys_description: Manually generate new encryption keys for all conversations.
settings.create_backup_description: Create an encrypted backup of your conversations and settings.
settings.security_audit_description: Perform a comprehensive security check of your account and devices.
settings.security_help_description: Learn more about security features and best practices.
